text: Kodi amene waika maziko a nyumba yake ndi cholinga choopa Mulungu ndikufuna chisangalalo chake ndi wabwino kapena iye amene waika maziko a nyumba yake mâ€™mphepete mwadzenje limene likugumukira dothi lake kugwera pamodzi ndi nyumbayo kumoto wa ku Gahena? Mulungu satsogolera anthu ochita zoipa
